data.name: Cross of Auria - Founder's Pack III
data.detailed_description:
The Cross of Auria Founder's Pack III is stuffed full of exclusive goodies for players to get a head start on their journey in Revan!

This pack includes:
• An accessory for Riley which grants access to the skill "Berserker Stance."
• A stone-killer axe which grants access to the skills "Gargoyle Strike" & "Ready-Guard."
• Four pieces of gear from the 30 point poison-resistant 'Ignis Set' - Chest, Gloves, Band, & Ring.
• 5000 Gold.
• 25 Mystery Coins.
• 30 Poison, Fire, & Frost Essences.
• 5 Phoenix Wings
• 5 of each tier 1 elemental flask (Fire, Frost, Water, Poison, Earth, Wind, Electric).
• 3 of each tier 1 elemental tome (Fire, Frost, Water, Poison, Earth, Wind, Electric).
• 10 Great Potions, Great Magick Potions, & Strong Elixirs.

Pack contents may be redeemed once per save file in the Veil, accessible from various points throughout the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Any modern GPU
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card.
  • Additional Notes: Any modern PC will do.
